name: Adventures Of Palmy - Pre-Pre-Alpha
description:
This is a game about the adventures of Palmy. He has a beautiful family and it is your job to save them from the evil chainsaws! They have begun to flood your wonderful sandy island of Palmatica. Defeat the chainsaws, And save your family!!!

WARNING

If you get stuck, restart the game. It is in Pre-Pre-Alpha. Updates will come (eventually).

Enjoy!!!!
